Namespace NZXTSharp.HuePlus

This namespace holds (nearly) all files needed to control a Hue+ device with NZXTSharp. Use of the NZXTSharp namespace is strongly reccomended.
The HuePlus class will be the primary point of interaction for this namespace.

To get started with controlling a Hue+ device, just construct a HuePlus instance, and start poking around its methods.

Classes

CandleLight

Represents an RGB Candle Light effect.

Direction

Represents a Direction effect param.

HuePlus

Represents an NZXT Hue+ lighting controller.

HuePlusChannel

Represents a channel on an NZXT device.

HuePlusChannelInfo

Represents information about a HuePlusChannel.
